授業目的: The aim is to use specific science and technology topics to spark an interest in the English Language and  increase user confidence and ability.
到達目標: By the end of the semester, students will have gained an interest in using English and will be less hesitant to use it in the future. Students will have increased their basic reading, writing, speaking, and listening abilities, and also have built on their critical thinking, comprehension, note-taking, and research skills.
特記事項: 【合併】科学技術英語Ａ　６（理学部）/科学技術英語Ａ　６（理工学部）/科学技術英語Ａ　６（工学部）/科学技術英語Ａ　６（生命環境学部）
授業方法: face-to-face sessions in the classroom using visual and audio technology.
